description: Detects known hacktool execution based on image name
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
name: Linux HackTool Execution
query: ((process.executable.text:(*\/sqlmap OR *\/teamserver OR *\/aircrack\-ng OR *\/john OR *\/setoolkit OR *\/wpscan OR *\/hydra OR *\/nikto OR *\/ebpfkit OR *\/bpfdos OR *\/exechijack OR *\/pidhide OR *\/writeblocker)) OR (process.executable.text:*\/linpeas*))
